dcterms:creator: F. M. Harper
J. A. Konstan
dcterms:description: This movie rating dataset has been widely used to evaluate collaborative filtering algorithms. It contains 1,000,209 ratings from 6,040 users for 3,900 movies, transformed into implicit data where each entry is marked as 0 or 1 indicating whether the user has rated the micro-video.
dcterms:title: MovieLens-1M

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
C. Targett
Q. Shi
A. Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 426,922 users, 23,965 videos, and 583,933 ratings from Amazon.com, transformed into implicit data and filtered to remove users with less than 5 interactions.
dcterms:title: Amazon Instant Video
